title: Alien.Isolation.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Alien.Isolation.Repack-R.G.Mechanics



Release info:  

Release year : 2014
Genre : Action (Survival Horror) / 3D / 1st Person
Developer : The Creative Assembly
Publisher : SEGA
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language:   Rus | Eng
Voice language:  Rus | Eng
Crack: CODEX




System requirements:  

Operating system : Windows 7
Processor : 3.16Ghz Intel Core 2 Duo E8500
Memory : 4 GB
Video Card : 1GB (AMD Radeon HD 5550 or Nvidia GeForce GT 430)
DirectX : Version 11
Free space on hard disk : 22 GB


Game information:  


Action thriller Alien: Isolation takes place fifteen years after
the events of the original films, Ridley Scott's "Alien". And now
the daughter of Ellen Ripley, Amanda, will face the horror of the
depths of space in an attempt to find out the truth about the
disappearance of her mother. In the role of Amanda you meet
with blinded panic brought to extreme despair people ruthless
and unpredictable ksenomorfov - Alien ... Amanda has no
outstanding power and has no special training. So, with your
help, it will show resourcefulness in a seemingly hopeless
situation, learn to make quick decisions in the face of mortal
danger and take full advantage of their only advantage - reason.
Only in this way will survive.



Game Features:  


You will experience the true horror of the stranger - the most
dangerous enemy, who will stop at nothing to get to you,
and immediately respond to your every move.
Hack electronic systems, use every opportunity to survive
and create objects to find a way out of any situation.
Hiding from the enemy, use diversionary tactics, or get
together with a terrifying enemy face to face?
Explore decommissioned and lost in the depths of space
trading station "Sevastopol", inhabited by desperate people.


RePack Features:  


Alien: Isolation
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
The ability to download only the necessary voiceovers
(voices_ru.bin - Russian | voices_en.bin - English)

Additions :  

Last Survivor
Crew Expendable
Season Pass
